description:
Kuranashi unveils his deadly game, and if the Twin Star Exorcists don`t win, it could mean the death of everyone in the town of Narukami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Narukami`s Most Ill-Fated Day: No Way to Run, No Place to Hide
Narukamimachi Saikyou no Hi: No Way to Run, No Place to Hide
Un jour funeste au quartier Narukami
鳴神町最凶の日 NO WAY TO RUN,NO PLACE TO HIDE
